metadata.title: CVE-2023-38649 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities exist in the VZTvzt_rd_get_facname decompression functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. Aspecially crafted .vzt file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victimwould need to open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the out-of-bounds write perfomed by the string copyloop.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
